Verses: 1 sagodhara Sinegam Nilaiththirukkakkadavadhu.
2 anniyarai Ubasarikka Maravaadhirungal; Adhinaale Silar Ariyaamal Dhevathoodharaiyum Ubasariththadhundu.
3 kattappattirukkiravargalode Neengalum Kattappattavargalpola Avargalai Ninaiththukkollungal; Neengalum Sareeraththodirukkiravargalendru Arindhu, Theenganubavikkiravargalai Ninaiththukkollungal.
4 vivaagam Yaavarukkullum Ganamulladhaayum, Vivaagamanjam Asusippadaadhadhaayumiruppadhaaga; Vesikkallaraiyum Vibasaarakkaararaiyum Dhevan Niyaayantheerppaar.
5 neengal Pana Aasaiyillaadhavargalaai Nadandhu, Ungalukku Irukkiravaigal Podhumendru Ennungal; Naan Unnaivittu Vilaguvadhumillai, Unnai Kaividuvadhumillai Endru Avar Solliyirukkiraare.
6 adhinaale Naam Dhairiyankondu: Karththar Enakku Sagaayar, Naan Bayappaden, Manushan Enakku Ennaseyvaan Endru Sollalaame.
7 dhevavasanaththai Ungalukku Podhiththu Ungalai Nadaththinavargalai Neengal Ninaiththu, Avargaludaiya Nadakkaiyin Mudivai Nandraai Sindhiththu, Avargaludaiya Visuvaasaththai Pinbatrungal.
8 yesukiristhu Netrum Indrum Endrum Maaraadhavaraayirukkiraar.

9 palavidhamaana Anniya Podhanaigalaal Alaippundu Thiriyaadhirungal. Pojanapadhaarththangalinaalalla, Kirubaiyinaale Irudhayam Sthirappadugiradhu Nalladhu; Pojanapadhaarththangalil Muyarchiseygiravargal Balanadaiyavillaiye.
10 namakku Oru Balipeedamundu, Adharkuriyavaigalai Pusikkiradharku Koodaaraththil Aaraadhanai Seygiravargalukku Adhigaaramillai.

11 enendraal, Endha Mirugangaludaiya Raththam Paavangalinimiththamaaga Parisuththa Sthalaththukkul Piradhaana Aasaariyanaale Konduvarappadugiradho, Andha Mirugangalin Udalgal Paalayaththukkuppurambe Sutterikkappadum.
12 andhappadiye, Yesuvum Thammudaiya Sondha Raththaththinaale Janaththai Parisuththanjseyyumpadiyaaga Nagara Vaasalukku Purambe Paadupattaar.
13 aagaiyaal, Naam Avarudaiya Nindhaiyai Sumandhu, Paalayaththukku Purambe Avaridaththirku Purappattu Pogakkadavom.
14 nilaiyaana Nagaram Namakku Inge Illai; Varappogiradhaiye Naadith Thedugirom.
15 aagaiyaal, Avarudaiya Naamaththai Thudhikkum Udhadugalin Kaniyaagiya Sthoththirabaliyai Avarmoolamaai Eppodhum Dhevanukku Seluththakkadavom.
16 andriyum Nanmaiseyyavum, Dhaanadharmampannavum Maravaadhirungal; Ippadippatta Baligalinmel Dhevan Piriyamaayirukkiraar.

17 ungalai Nadaththugiravargal, Ungal Aaththumaakkalukkaaga Uththaravaadhampannugiravargalaai Vizhiththirukkiravargalaanapadiyaal, Avargal Dhukkaththode Alla, Sandhoshaththode Adhaiseyyumpadi, Avargalukku Keezhppadindhu Adangungal; Avargal Dhukkaththode Appadi Seydhaal Adhu Ungalukku Pirayojanamaayirukkamaattaadhe.
18 engalukkaaga Vendikkollungal; Naangal Nalmanasaatchiyullavargalaai Ellaavatrilum Yokkiyamaai Nadakka Virumbugiromendru Nichchayiththirukkirom.
19 naan Adhiseekkiramaai Ungalidaththil Varumpadikku Neengal Ippadi Vendikkollumpadi Adhigamaaik Kettukkollugiren.
20 niththiya Udanpadikkaiyin Raththaththinaale Aadugaludaiya Periya Meypparaana Nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesuvai Mariththorilirundhu Erivarappannina Samaadhaanaththin Dhevan,

21 yesu Kiristhuvai Kondu Thamakkumunbaaga Piriyamaanadhai Ungalil Nadappiththu, Neengal Thammudaiya Siththaththinpadiseyya Ungalai Sagalavidha Narkiriyaiyilum Seerporundhinavargalaakkuvaaraaga; Avarukku Endrendraikkum Magimai Undaavadhaaga. Aamen.
22 sagodharare, Naan Surukkamaai Ungalukku Ezhudhina Indhap Buththimadhiyaana Vaarththaigalai Neengal Porumaiyaai Etrukkollumpadi Vendikkollugiren.
23 sagodharanaagiya Theemoththeyu Vidudhalaiyaakkappattaanendru Ariveergalaaga; Avan Seekkiramaai Vandhaal, Avanudanekooda Naan Vandhu, Ungalai Kaanben.
24 ungalai Nadaththugiravargalaiyum, Parisuththavaangal Yaavaraiyum Vaazhththungal. Iththaaliyaa Dhesaththaar Yaavarum Ungalukku Vaazhththudhal Sollugiraargal.
25 kirubaiyaanadhu Ungalanaivarodunkooda Iruppadhaaga. Aamen.
